text: ยง 2-101 Name; powers and rights of the corporation; seal. The city shall be a body politic and corporate in fact and in law with power to contract and to be contracted with, to sue and be sued, to have a common seal and to have perpetual succession.

chapter.text: POWERS AND RIGHTS OF THE CORPORATION; EMBLEMS AND INSIGNIA

heading.catch_text: Name; powers and rights of the corporation; seal.
